create_queue_with_members.template_string: Create a queue for case management with name {queue_name}. {email_instruction}. Include {role_users} as the member.

create_case_assignment_rule.template_string: Help me with creating a case assignment rule named '{rule_name}' by assigning {entry_conditions} to {assignee}. {sort_order_description}.

escalate_case_change_owner.template_string: The case {case_number} {case_context}. I need to change its status to escalated and change its owner to {user_profile}.

create_entitlement_record.template_string: According to the service level agreement (SLA), the {account_name} account has the {support_type} entitlement, which {date_description}. Create an entitlement record named {entitlement_name} for me.

create_milestone.template_string: To improve the customer service quality, we defined a new entitlement process with {milestone_count} milestones. {milestone_descriptions}.

create_entitlement_process.template_string: Create an entitlement process with the name {process_name} for the {record_type} records. The {entry_condition}. Include {milestone_details}. {violation_action}.

add_skills_for_routing.template_string: I just recruit a crew of agents for my service teams. They have the following skills {skill_list}. Add these skills so I can later use them for skill-based routing creation.

create_service_resource_with_skills.template_string: We onboard a new member {member_name}, who is a service agent and can take {skill_tasks} related tasks {start_date}. {certificate_expiry}. Create a service resource record and add service resource skills for {member_name}.

create_knowledge_article.template_string: Create a knowledge article and publish it. The title should be '{article_title}' and the article detail should be '{article_content}'.

create_survey.template_string: Create a survey with the name {survey_name}. {question_1_instruction}. {question_2_instruction}.

create_incident_record.template_string: {incident_context}. Create an incident record with the following details: {incident_details}.

create_change_request_link_incident.template_string: After an intensive investigation, the root cause for the incident '{incident_subject}' is found. We need to create a change request with the following details. {change_request_details}. Link this change request to the incident case and update the incident status to {new_status}.
